=== 0.1.2 ===
- New convention: '/scheduled/' in the URL indicates a scheduled job
- Shortened dynamic role syntax
- Updated requirements

=== 0.0.8 ===
- Use HOST_URL for calling a scheduled job

=== 0.0.7 ===
- Endpoint for running jobs from AWS health check

=== 0.0.5 ===
- Bug fix running jobs manually outside of scheduled time

=== 0.0.4 ===
- Ability to disable scheduled jobs

=== 0.0.3 ===
- Redirect to job when unable to call a job asynchronously

=== 0.0.2 ===
- Endpoint definitions in their own model

=== 0.0.1 ===
- Initial Release
